title: Where Lies End
description: Sometimes unexplained breakups can leave a gaping hole inside a wounded heart.Diane Benson doesn't know what to think when Rick Embleton returns to town. After he left her over three years ago, she had barely started to piece her life back together. Now she must face the realities of the past as she discovers that Rick left her because of someone else's lies. Can she convince Rick of the truth or will he always believe her capable of the indiscretions attributed to her?Where Lies End is a story that shows that sometimes even past heartache can be mended.
author: Ruth Davidson
